RelatedSentence: Business Report is making its first ever foray into digital broadcasting today , with the launch of a daily business show on CliffCentral.com , a new multi-platform broadcaster which debuted at the beginning of this month .
The show , called Candid Business , will be anchored by Business Report editor Ellis Mnyandu , who will also be its executive producer .
Candid Business will be co-produced and co-hosted by Arnie Hicks , a broadcaster and marketer .

A0: a daily business show on CliffCentral.com , a new multi-platform broadcaster which debuted at the beginning of this month
RelatedSentence: This show takes Business Report to the global stage , and it is our way of taking the African business story to the world , said Mnyandu .
